data.title: Lucius Caviola: A Future with Digital Minds? Expert Estimates and Societal Response — The Partnership for Research Into Sentient Machines
data.description: Lucius Caviola is an Assistant Professor in the Social Science of AI at the University of Cambridge's Leverhulme Centre for the Future of Intelligence and a Research Associate in Psychology at Harvard University. His research explores how the potential arrival of conscious AI will reshape our social
data.site_name: The Partnership for Research Into Sentient Machines
